QuantitativeFundamentalBusinessDataEntit.NAME: Height Dimension
QuantitativeFundamentalBusinessDataEntit.DEFINITION: Vertical dimension of an object when object in the upright position.

QuantitativeFundamentalBusinessDataEntit.NAME: Length Dimension
QuantitativeFundamentalBusinessDataEntit.DEFINITION: Largest horizontal dimension of an object measured when the object in the upright position.

QuantitativeFundamentalBusinessDataEntit.NAME: Magnitude
QuantitativeFundamentalBusinessDataEntit.DEFINITION: A numerical quantitative measure expressed usually as a multiple of a standard unit

QuantitativeFundamentalBusinessDataEntit.NAME: Volume Dimension
QuantitativeFundamentalBusinessDataEntit.DEFINITION: Volumes of regular solids are those that have well defined dimensions of length, width, height, and diameter that can be measured with a suitable instrument such as a metric ruler. A suitable geometric formula may then be applied to obtain the volume.

QuantitativeFundamentalBusinessDataEntit.NAME: Width Dimension
QuantitativeFundamentalBusinessDataEntit.DEFINITION: Shorter measurement of the two horizontal dimensions measured with object in the upright position.
